Rule.Description: Only “Tenured/tenure-track faculty” and “ Non-tenure-track research faculty” can “Add” a “Whole Proposal”
Only “PI” can “Add” "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" and "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel";
Only “PI” can “Delete” "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" and "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel";
Only “Co-PI” can "Add" "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel";
“Co-PI” can "Delete" "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel";
“Teaching faculty”, “Research staff”, “ Professional staff”, “ Administrator” cannot “Add” a “Whole Proposal” unless delegated by faculty.

“PI” can “View” “Investigator Information”, “Project Information”, “Sponsor and Budget Information”, “Cost Share Information”, “University Commitments”, “Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information”, “Compliance Information”, “Additional Information”, “Collaboration Information”, “Proprietary/Confidential Information”, “Certification/Signatures”, “OSP Section”, “Appendices”

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: “Co-PI” can “View” “Investigator Information”, “Project Information”, “Sponsor and Budget Information”, “Cost Share Information”, “University Commitments”, “Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information”, “Compliance Information”, “Additional Information”, “Collaboration Information”, “Proprietary/Confidential Information”, “Certification/Signatures”, “OSP Section”, “Appendices”

Rule.Description: "PI" can “Submit” a “Whole Proposal” when SubmittedByPI= NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = true and DeletedByPI=NOTDELETED
“PI” can “View” a “Audit Log” .

“PI” can “Edit” "Investigator Information", "InvestigatorInformation.PI", "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI", "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel", "Project Information","Sponsor and Budget Information" , "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments" ,"Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information" , "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures","Appendices" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is false;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: “PI” can not “Edit” "OSP Section""
“Co-PI” can “Edit” "Investigator Information", "Appendices" and "Certification/Signatures"

“Co-PI” can not “Edit” "InvestigatorInformation.PI", "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI", "Project Information","Sponsor and Budget Information" , "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments" ,"Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information" , "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information","OSP Section" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is false;

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: “Department Chair” can “Edit” "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByDepartmentChair= READYFORAPPROVAL
